channel.title: [Help] changing the starter please help me
channel.description: Hi guys on my source there is an outragious starter and i want to lower it down but i dont know where to go maybe you could help me?

item.title: [Help] changing the starter please help me
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 05, 2009, 05:00:54 pm[/size][hr]Never mind guys i can change the starter but thanks very much
[/quote]

THIS WAS FIXED. STOP POSTING HERE.

/Modlockrequest

item.source: [Help] changing the starter please help me

item.title: [Help] changing the starter please help me
item.dc:creator: @RedZombiescape RedZombiescape
item.description:
@RedZombiescape wrote:

When You Log In Do you have them Or do you Have to Type ::Starter

If Type Starter

Go to Client Java
CRTL F ‘Starter’
Change the Id Code

Log On and starter auto

Go to Player.java
Find one of the item code
CRTL F ‘Code’
When you get it to something like

Head
shiled

Change the number to the id

Hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] changing the starter please help me
item.dc:creator: @coocoobanana coocoobanana
item.description:
@coocoobanana wrote:

I found this because i couldnt find what you told me to searchif(starter == 0){ starter = 1; sM("Get Pking!"); showInterface(3559); apset = true; addItem(1321, 1); addItem(1189, 1); addItem(841, 1); addItem(882, 500); addItem(862, 1); addItem(892, 600); addItem(392, 1000); addItem(2441, 500); addItem(2437, 500); addItem(4587, 1); addItem(5698, 1); addItem(4151, 1); addItem(6528, 1); addItem(995, 50000000);

Should i have looked in source or client on client notepad?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 05, 2009, 05:00:54 pm[/size][hr]Never mind guys i can change the starter but thanks very much

item.title: [Help] changing the starter please help me
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Open client.java and search (ctrl+F)

        if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {

then you can edit from there
